definition[0]: to twist your body from side to side with small quick movements
example[0]: Stop wriggling and let me put your T-shirt on.
example[1]: The dog wriggled free and ran off.
definition[1]: to move a part of your body backwards and forwards with small movements
example[3]: She took off her shoes and wriggled her toes.
definition[2]: a movement in which you twist your body from side to side
